It should be fine. In my update, I'm doing my own simple aerodynamics for lift for missiles, letting stock aero calculate drag, so worst case scenario is I would need a config to cancel lift forces from FAR while letting it handle drag.

For bombs I need to cancel everything and use a very simple drag model (old stock drag) or else the bomb prediction will always be off-target.
